name: Mood & Music
description: Front-end app that analyzes a photo and returns the song associated with the facial emotion that has been detected. Users can enable the app to use their webcam to take facial snapshots or upload an image file of their own.

name: The Neverending Dead
description: A full-stack browser RPG game where players must defeat the last boss from a line of enemies. If the player dies, he/she joins the line of enemies. Players can buy items or skills after each round.

name: Zephyr Node
description: Productivity app that helps users organize their notes, flashcards, to-dos, and reminders. Users have the option to send flashcards and reminders as text messages.

name: Pokemon Memory Game
description: A React.js memory game that is Pokemon-themed. The user must not click on the same Pokemon twice.

name: NPR Mongo Scraper
description: A scraping app that grabs articles from NPR.org and allows the user to save notes on them. It is a React app that uses MongoDB and Mongoose.
